node.name: Trac Wiki Editor 4 Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
Trac Wiki Editor 4 Eclipse is an eclipse plugin that allows you to edit Trac wiki pages from inside your Eclipse IDE.

Current version 0.1.0 provides the following features:

  • Trac Wiki Servers explorer
    • New hierachical tree view among other fixes
  • Eclipse Wiki Editor:
    • Upgraded the editor to benefit from Mylyn WikiText.
    • Spellcheck
  • Wiki Page management: Creation, edition and page deletion.
  • Concurrent edition management:
    • Prevents overwriting other users changes when a concurrent edit happens.
    • Helps merge contents when a concurrent edit happens.
node.body:
Trac Wiki Editor 4 Eclipse is an eclipse plugin that allows you to edit Trac wiki pages from inside your Eclipse IDE.

Current version 0.1.0 provides the following features:

  • Trac Wiki Servers explorer
    • New hierachical tree view among other fixes
  • Eclipse Wiki Editor:
    • Upgraded the editor to benefit from Mylyn WikiText.
    • Spellcheck
  • Wiki Page management: Creation, edition and page deletion.
  • Concurrent edition management:
    • Prevents overwriting other users changes when a concurrent edit happens.
    • Helps merge contents when a concurrent edit happens.
